timeline.bodyText: Is it intended to disable loadbalancers also for ocp4? Wasn't that some AWS infra which supports load balancers?
timeline.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: Even if you specify the ocp4 for the PR, it will deploy the crc, so I think this is correct
replies.author: im-konge
